name: WIZARD TOWER (wadapan)
description:
There is a wizard on the highest floor. When they die, the tower will be yours.

I made this demo for university, about university. Check out my full behind-the-scenes commentary!

Left-click to move, right-click to open/close your inventory, scroll to review the log. A cheat mode is accessible by pressing the ` key. This exposes some stats, and also unlocks the following keybinds:

  • UP: go up a floor
  • SPACE: fight an enemy
  • 1-0: spawn items
